Career Summary      
 
• As a result oriented engineering professional with 2 year of experience in  Execution. Testing  
 
 and commissioning of industrial engineering projects.    
  
• Sound experience in applications of Fire Protection  for various industrial customers.  
 
• Hands on experience in Pipeline  fabrication, erection and commissioning of automatic and 
manual sprinkler system, and Hose system, Foam System and Fire Extinguisher Systems, Fire 
pump rooms.  
 
• Good experience in  handling client interactions and project documentations.   
• A highly passionate, goal oriented and a team player with the ability to work under pressure.   
 
Experience:  
Project Engineer (MAY 2016 to still now). Company in METEC  
DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION ENGINEERS INDIA PVT LTD  
 
 
 
 
Project Description:  
 
The scope of the project is for the design, supply, erection, testing and 
commissioning of sprinkler system, hydrant system and Fire Alarm System. The project involved 
supply of Automatic Sprin kler System, External Hydrant ring main System, Internal Hydrant ring 
main system, Fire alarm System as per the requirements of client. The project advisor was M/s. 
Metec design and construction engineers India private limited. We have successfully execute d the 
project within the project schedule.

Role& Responsibilities:  
 
As a Lead Sr. Engineer, I was responsible for

project management and execution at site.  
 
• Involved in drafting the drawing in AutoCAD as per mod ification as required at site.   
• Execution of Hydro Static Pressure test as per NFPA CHAPTER -13  
• Preparation of Material Receipt and Inspection Report   
• Conducting internal team meeting at site   
• Attending weekly review meeting by the client   
• Perform Low Cost  consumption techniques   
• Preparing and closing of test pack and punch list for erected system   
• Inspect all the works completed as per drawing and preparing Static Completion   
• Sprinklers handled – Upright, pendent, Side wall,   
• Commissioning & Handing Over a ctivities.
